tag_list: social-platform, facebook, twitter, private-activities, events, sharing-information, sport, life-outside, facebook-app, iphone, android, channel-information
overview:
John is a Swedish entrepreneur who is most known for his work with the startup Pepfire which he originally founded back in 2007.

John’s work, the same as Pepfire’s, consists out of concepts that makes communication between people smarter and more accurate online using interests and locations for channeling information.
